relationships.evidence_text: a group should be of experiences in groups learning in groups should be a fundamental part of treating all trauma.
we evolved as a species in small groups.
you read Alexis to Tocqueville on America in the middle of the 19th century.

it is clear in traditional societies that when there is a serious problem it is yes there can be things done individually but there needs to be a reestablishing not only of internal homey of social care.
the group is the vehicle for that.
And there is a response that's been studied some by Shelley Taylor.
it is known to Aboriginal people and it is clear in traditional societies that when there is a serious problem
there needs to be a reestablishing not only of internal homey of social care... a balance between the individual the social the natural and the spiritual world
there is a response that's been studied some by Shelley Taylor at UCLA called the tendon befriend response
what happens when there is stress and trauma the fight or flight response is mitigated and mediated by a response that she called tend and befriend
they in addition to putting out stress hormones like adrenaline and cortisol that in that tend and befriend response women our females of species put out estrogen
they will gather together to take care of the more vulnerable members of the herd or of the social group of human beings
when we work with Georgetown medical students their stress hormones who medical students have participated in these mind body skills groups
their stress hormones don't go up at exam time the way other students stress hormones do
the group is a vital part of healing
people will say I feel so alone even though tens of thousands of people around them have suffered the same calamity
especially if it's a group that allows people to participate as they want that doesn't force them to talk about trauma
we help them feel safe on a biological level with the techniques the self-believering and the shaking and dancing
we're giving you an opportunity to learn about yourself to bring you back to the world
